SELECT c.content_key_id AS content_key_id , c.content_key AS content_key, ifnull(p.process_key_id,"0") AS process_key_id,ifnull(p.process_key,"暂无") AS process_key,ifnull(p.reason,"暂无") AS reason, ifnull(p.process_priority,"0") AS process_priority FROM content_key AS c LEFT OUTER JOIN process_key AS p ON p.content_key_id=c.content_key_id ORDER BY c.content_key_id,p.process_priority

SELECT c.content_key_id AS content_key_id , c.content_key AS content_key, ifnull(p.process_key_id,"0") AS process_key_id,ifnull(p.process_key,"暂无") AS process_key,ifnull(p.reason,"暂无") AS reason, ifnull(p.process_priority,"0") AS process_priority FROM content_key AS c LEFT OUTER JOIN process_key AS p ON p.content_key_id=c.content_key_id WHERE c.content_key LIKE '%${content_key}%' ORDER BY c.content_key_id,p.process_priority

SELECT c.content_key_id AS content_key_id , c.content_key AS content_key, ifnull(p.process_key_id,"0") AS process_key_id,ifnull(p.process_key,"暂无") AS process_key,ifnull(p.reason,"暂无") AS reason, ifnull(p.process_priority,"0") AS process_priority FROM content_key AS c LEFT OUTER JOIN process_key AS p ON p.content_key_id=c.content_key_id WHERE p.process_key LIKE '%${process_key}%' ORDER BY c.content_key_id,p.process_priority

SELECT c.content_key_id AS content_key_id , c.content_key AS content_key, ifnull(p.process_key_id,"0") AS process_key_id,ifnull(p.process_key,"暂无") AS process_key,ifnull(p.reason,"暂无") AS reason, ifnull(p.process_priority,"0") AS process_priority FROM content_key AS c LEFT OUTER JOIN process_key AS p ON p.content_key_id=c.content_key_id WHERE p.process_key LIKE '%${process_key}%' AND c.content_key LIKE '%${content_key}%' ORDER BY c.content_key_id,p.process_priority
